item.title: Psychometric Materials
item.description: Here is a list of different code assignments I have compiled from psychometrics.

item.title: Helpful R Cheat Sheet
item.description: The Basics Reading In & Outputting Data: Read in a delimited text file df <- read.table(‘file.txt’) #if you have missing codes, can do: df <- read.table(‘file.txt’, missing = -99) #if you have multiple missing codes, can do: df <- read.table(‘file.txt’, na.strings=c("-98","-99", "-999")) Similarly, read in a csv file df <- read.csv(‘file.csv’) Read out a delimited text file write.table(df, ‘file.txt’) #saves this to your working directory Read out a csv file
